items.title: [Enhancement]: Floating Bar Chart with Timeseries on X-Axis
items.body:
### Contact Details

mail@lindener.it

### Summary

It would be great to have a Floating Bar Chart with Timeseries on the x-axis to present events over time. 
E.g. for a group of 5 locations you can easily present events and their length for each individual location with different event types.
Example of how this can look:
https://software.es.net/react-timeseries-charts/#/example/outages

### Justification

The mentioned chart helps visualizing events e.g. outages or usage of resources in a well structured and easily understandable fashion. 

### Desired UX and success metrics

The user should be able to easily understand 1-n event timelines in a single chart. It should be possible to filter the events based on a provided data field (e.g. event type/category)

### "Must have" functionality

Support different granularity of timeseries (hourly, daily, weekly,...).
Include ability to change color of bars based on data value (e.g. event type)
Include ability to add label to the floating bars.

### Specific timeline issues / requests

Within this year

### Available extra resources

I can test and validate.
